meanings: [용이하게] easily, readily, with ease [facility], without difficulty [great effort], [평이하게] plainly, simply.

vlive.korean: 쉽게. It's easy and comfortable. 듣기 View video Park Si Hwan : 스무살 형아(19) 술ㅇㅁㅇ!!

examples.korean: Add more water until the dough is workable. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 반죽이 주무르기 쉽게 될 때까지 물을 더 넣어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The ironing board folds flat for easy storage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 다리미판은 보관하기 쉽게 납작 접을 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Prejudices can easily become implanted in the mind. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 편견은 사람 마음속에 쉽게 뿌리내리게 될 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Children often get fractious and tearful when tired. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아이들은 지치면 쉽게 짜증을 내고 잘 운다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: This standard is easily attainable by most students. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 수준은 대부분의 학생들이 쉽게 달성할 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
